entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0080.9019] ifrs-full:ProceedsFromCurrentBorrowings has a value of -3,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProceedsFromCurrentBorrowings fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300H9RLRTRTLRUZ73/2020-12-31/ESEF/SI/0/549300H9RLRTRTLRUZ73-2020-12-31.zip/549300H9RLRTRTLRUZ73-2020-12-31/reports/549300H9RLRTRTLRUZ73-2020-12-31.xhtml 20080

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 0030 - Statement - Consolidated Statement of Other Comprehensive Income but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.0 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 0020 - Statement - Consolidated Income Statement but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:ImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossTradeReceivables All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.0 -

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 1,553,489,000 reported in the network role http://www.krka.biz/en/xbrl/role/ConsolidatedStatementofFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 118,350,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.krka.biz/en/xbrl/role/ConsolidatedStatementofChangesinEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of RetainedEarnings : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300H9RLRTRTLRUZ73/2020-12-31/ESEF/SI/0/549300H9RLRTRTLRUZ73-2020-12-31.zip/549300H9RLRTRTLRUZ73-2020-12-31/reports/549300H9RLRTRTLRUZ73-2020-12-31.xhtml 16982
